doc:
Lisa Varga https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisa_Varga 0 Lisa Varga (born April 8, 1971) is an American actress, producer, writer, model, and TV host. Her acting roles include Homeland (2011), NBC television movie Game Time: Tackling the Past (2011) as Karen Walker, Marley Me (2008), and won best actress as Janis McKenzie in Armed and Deadly at the Movieville International Film Festival. Lisa Varga is currently the host and producer of Beyond The Offseason with Lisa Varga, a series about athletes and charity. She is also the creator, writer, producer, and host of a new music entertainment series called Nashville Live. Ms. Varga has her own production company, Lisa Varga Entertainment and has over twenty years of experience in the world of entertainment, music, and sports. Lisa_Varga ( born April_8 , 1971 ) is an_American_actress , producer_,_writer_,_model , and TV_host . Her_acting_roles include Homeland_(_2011_) , NBC_television_movie_Game_Time : Tackling the_Past_(_2011_) as Karen_Walker , Marley_(_2008_) , and won best_actress as Janis_McKenzie in Armed_and_Deadly at the_Movieville_International_Film_Festival . Lisa_Varga is currently the_host_and_producer of Beyond The_Offseason with Lisa_Varga , a_series about athletes_and_charity . She is also the_creator , writer , producer , and host of a_new_music_entertainment_series called Nashville_Live . Ms._Varga has her_own_production_company , Lisa_Varga_Entertainment and has over_twenty_years of experience in the_world of entertainment_,_music , and sports .
